## Description {#details}

This group contains function that operate on global alias values.

<MemberDefinition

### LLVMGetNextGlobalAlias() {#ga4b794045d4797dcb9ce36dac26e18341}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetNextGlobalAlias (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> GA)</>}>
Advance a GlobalAlias iterator to the next GlobalAlias.

Returns NULL if the iterator was already at the end and there are no more global aliases.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l02732">2732</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02365">2365</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMGetPreviousGlobalAlias() {#gab53f2ccab1363e10116a064467c4837d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetPreviousGlobalAlias (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> GA)</>}>
Decrement a GlobalAlias iterator to the previous GlobalAlias.

Returns NULL if the iterator was already at the beginning and there are no previous global aliases.
